0.1.1.name: wordpress/no-404-errors
0.1.1.description:
Save your visitors from garbage 404 errors!

Some shared hosting providers intercept 404 errors to provide their own custom error pages. Unfortunately this interferes with WordPress and causes raw html to be sent to the browser. This plugin changes 404 errors to 301 errors and redirects to a known page.

See the No 404 homepage for more information.
